title: 1978 Soft Top Convertible MG MGB
item_description:
1978 Soft Top Convertible MG MGB

Removal Note: This lot is only available for removal on Thursday, October 23, or Friday October 24, 2025, from 9:00AM to 3:30PM each day, by APPOINTMENT ONLY. Earlier removal of this lot will not be permitted. 

Specifications

  • Mfg Year: 1978
  • Make: MG
  • Model: MGB
  • VIN: GHN5UJ457353
  • License: NOT FOUND
    • Registration Expiration: Unknown
    • VIN RECORD NOT ON FILE
  • Odometer Reads: 65053
  • Key: Not Available
  • GVWR: 2,700 Lbs
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive
  • Body Style: Convertible
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Manual
  • Tire Size: 185/70R14

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Red
  • Doors: Two Door

Probate Court Estate Note: This vehicle is behind sold on behalf of a probate estate. No active record on file with CA DMV. Bill of Sale, Statement of Facts, Death Certificate, and and Probate Court Documents will be mailed approximately 1-2 weeks after auction removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Probate Court Sells this vehicle "as-is" with no title/no active record on file with CA DMV. The Buyer agrees to purchase the vehicle "as-is" and agrees to repair and smog vehicle. An "as-is" no-smog bill of sale must be signed by both the administrator of the probate estate and the buyer in an agreement to these stated terms. Buyer accepts they are fully responsible for all aspects of smog, repairs to smog, (if required), inspections, transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to California DMV.
